CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__Address1__c),"", vlocity_ins__Address1__c & ", ") & IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__Address2__c), "", vlocity_ins__Address2__c & ", " ) & IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__City__c), "", vlocity_ins__City__c & ", ") & TEXT(vlocity_ins__State__c) & " " & IF( ISBLANK(vlocity_ins__PostalCode__c), "", vlocity_ins__PostalCode__c & ", ") & vlocity_ins__Country__c
CustomField.label: Location
